org.opensha.eq

Class Magnitudes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opensha.eq.Magnitudes

  • public final class Magnitudes
extends Object
    Earthquake magnitude utilities.
    Author:
    Peter Powers

    • Field Detail

      • MIN_MAG

        public static final double MIN_MAG
        Minimum allowed earthquake magnitude (-2.0). This numeric value is used for range checking and is not bound to any particular magnitude scale.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_MAG

        public static final double MAX_MAG
        Maximum allowed earthquake magnitude (9.7). This numeric value is used for range checking and is not bound to any particular magnitude scale.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MU

        public static final double MU
        Shear modulus. Î¼ = 3 * 1010 dyne/cm2.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public Magnitudes()

    • Method Detail

      • validateMag

        public static double validateMag(double mag)
        Verifies that a magnitude value is between MIN_MAG and MAX_MAG (inclusive). Method returns the supplied value and can be used inline.
        Parameters:
        mag - magnitude to validate
        Returns:
        the supplied magnitude
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if magdip value is out of range
        See Also:
        DataUtils.validate(Range, String, double)

      • magToMoment

        public static double magToMoment(double magnitude)
        Convert moment magnitude, MW, to seismic moment, M0.
        Parameters:
        magnitude - to convert
        Returns:
        the equivalent seismic moment in Newton-meters

      • momentToMag

        public static double momentToMag(double moment)
        Convert seismic moment, M0, to moment magnitude, Mw.
        Parameters:
        moment - to convert (in Newton-meters)
        Returns:
        the equivalent moment magnitude
